{"id":537226647,"lang":"cpp","time":"7Â months","timestamp":1628749696,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/537226647/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Divide Two Integers","memory":"5.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int divide(int dividend, int divisor) {\n        if(divisor==1) return dividend;\n        if((divisor==-1 && dividend==(1<<31)))return INT_MAX;\n        if(dividend==0)return 0;\n        long ans=0;\n        bool s=(dividend<=0)==(divisor<=0);\n        long div=labs(dividend),dvs=labs(divisor);\n        while(div>=dvs){\n            long c=1,t=dvs;\n            while((t<<1)<=div){\n                t<<=1;\n                c<<=1;\n            }\n            ans+=c;\n            div-=t;\n        }\n        return s?ans:-ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"divide-two-integers"}
